mapper.select: select id, rid, cons_no, cons_name, area_name, event_time, pap_r, pap_r_pre, pap_r_diff, t_factor, ele from dws_peixun.ele_con_tem where id = #{id}

select id, rid, cons_no, cons_name, area_name, event_time, pap_r, pap_r_pre, pap_r_diff, t_factor, ele from dws_peixun.ele_con_tem where cons_no in
#{no}
select id, rid, cons_no, cons_name, area_name, event_time, pap_r, pap_r_pre, pap_r_diff, t_factor, ele from dws_peixun.ele_con_tem limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into dws_peixun.ele_con_tem(rid, cons_no, cons_name, area_name, event_time, pap_r, pap_r_pre, pap_r_diff, t_factor, ele) values (#{rid}, #{consNo}, #{consName}, #{areaName}, #{eventTime}, #{papR}, #{papRPre}, #{papRDiff}, #{tFactor}, #{ele})

insert into dws_peixun.ele_con_tem(rid, cons_no, cons_name, area_name, event_time, pap_r, pap_r_pre, pap_r_diff, t_factor, ele) values
(#{entity.rid}, #{entity.consNo}, #{entity.consName}, #{entity.areaName}, #{entity.eventTime}, #{entity.papR}, #{entity.papRPre}, #{entity.papRDiff}, #{entity.tFactor}, #{entity.ele})

insert into dws_peixun.ele_con_tem(rid, cons_no, cons_name, area_name, event_time, pap_r, pap_r_pre, pap_r_diff, t_factor, ele) values
(#{entity.rid}, #{entity.consNo}, #{entity.consName}, #{entity.areaName}, #{entity.eventTime}, #{entity.papR}, #{entity.papRPre}, #{entity.papRDiff}, #{entity.tFactor}, #{entity.ele})
on duplicate key update rid = values(rid) , cons_no = values(cons_no) , cons_name = values(cons_name) , area_name = values(area_name) , event_time = values(event_time) , pap_r = values(pap_r) , pap_r_pre = values(pap_r_pre) , pap_r_diff = values(pap_r_diff) , t_factor = values(t_factor) , ele = values(ele)
mapper.update:
update dws_peixun.ele_con_tem
rid = #{rid},
cons_no = #{consNo},
cons_name = #{consName},
area_name = #{areaName},
event_time = #{eventTime},
pap_r = #{papR},
pap_r_pre = #{papRPre},
pap_r_diff = #{papRDiff},
t_factor = #{tFactor},
ele = #{ele},
where id = #{id}
